name: AL Code Analysis Ruleset
description: Combined ruleset for CodeCop, UICop, and PerTenantExtensionCop

rules.justification: Object IDs must be unique
rules.description: Object IDs must be unique

rules.justification: Object names must be unique
rules.description: Object names must be unique

rules.justification: AL code files must have the correct suffix
rules.description: AL code files must have the correct suffix

rules.justification: The page property AccessByPermission must be set
rules.description: The page property AccessByPermission must be set

rules.justification: Variables must have meaningful names
rules.description: Variables must have meaningful names

rules.justification: Field names should follow the capitalize convention used by platform
rules.description: Field names should follow the capitalize convention used by platform

rules.justification: Variables should be initialized
rules.description: Variables should be initialized

rules.justification: Use the WITH statement with caution
rules.description: Use the WITH statement with caution

rules.justification: Avoid using hardcoded URLs
rules.description: Avoid using hardcoded URLs

rules.justification: Avoid using hardcoded IPs
rules.description: Avoid using hardcoded IPs

rules.justification: Variables should be declared in the correct order
rules.description: Variables should be declared in the correct order

rules.justification: An extension cannot write to a dictionary table in OnModify/OnInsert/OnDelete trigger
rules.description: An extension cannot write to a dictionary table in OnModify/OnInsert/OnDelete trigger

rules.justification: An extension cannot add unique constraints to platform tables
rules.description: An extension cannot add unique constraints to platform tables

rules.justification: An extension cannot add a primary or secondary key to a table
rules.description: An extension cannot add a primary or secondary key to a table

rules.justification: An extension cannot rename fields on a table
rules.description: An extension cannot rename fields on a table

rules.justification: Caption must be specified for page fields
rules.description: Caption must be specified for page fields

rules.justification: Caption must be specified for pages
rules.description: Caption must be specified for pages

rules.justification: Caption must be specified for actions
rules.description: Caption must be specified for actions

rules.justification: ToolTip should be specified for page fields
rules.description: ToolTip should be specified for page fields

rules.justification: ToolTip should be specified for actions
